Global Gun Safety is working to save the lives of hundreds of children each year who accidently shoot themselves with a handgun.  The company is ramping up to sell an amazing electronic/mechanical trigger lock called ChildSafe One.  It is designed to scare children away from a gun while alerting their parents.  In addition to two alarms, an automatic lockdown, a Bluetooth alarm system, and a coming GPS tracking system, it offers a quick-release biometric fingerprint reader for home safety.  Additional electronic features to protect children will be available on ChildSafe Two at the end of 2016.Global Gun Safety will also market other gun safety products and serve as a clearinghouse for gun safety information, such as how to keep your child safe when visiting grandparents who own guns or how to safely travel with a gun and a teenager.
Marketing Psychology Consultant and Coach, University marketing professor, marketing author

I believe the more we give to others, the more we get in return, both in business and in having a meaningful life.  I’ve spent two decades studying, teaching, and practicing the science/art of influencing people.  This is not rocket science, but it is brain science.  Often problems that puzzle others have straightforward answers to me based on my particular skills.  I can share them in such areas as . . .	How to use my Buyer Motivation Analysis to beat competitors not using it 	How to create a brand image most appealing to customers or clients	How to increase the perceived value of your product or service	How to position your product/service above your competitors in the buyer’s mind	How to know which features to emphasize and which to forget in advertising	How to discover and use emotional motivators to seduce buyers	How to pick which logical and emotional satisfactions are key to buyers	How to use fear to bring buyers to you	How to analyze the four levels of buyer motivation and use them all	How to cash in on the fundamental principle of marketing psychology – “people don’t want  what you are selling.”    And much, much more!Psychological marketing influences how buyers see your product/service, putting them in a receptive frame of mind for your sales pitch, and even selling them beforehand!  It give you the “magic inch” of difference separating the winner from second place.  Since buying begins in the mind, doesn’t it make sense to start your marketing there?
Teach courses in speech, interviewing, film, business communications, non-verbal communication, and the social influence of media. (adjunct)

Consulting company specializing in helping businesses better understand their customers'​ true buying motivations. Research and analysis services focused on the creation of a category-specific Buyer Motivation Analysis which can serve as the foundation for all marketing decisions from branding and strategy to messages and packaging.  Clients have included US West, Harrah’s, 1-800-Flowers, MultiPlan PPOs (New York), Wisconsin Preferred Provider Network, Crate & Barrel, Allied Global Partners (Tokyo), among many others, including Western Dental, California’s largest dental chain. The four month psychological marketing research project for them resulted in a 200 page Buyer Motivation Analysis report detailing exactly which brand image, messages, graphics, and staff behavior is needed to maximize the dental experience for all major segments of the client's target market.  New psychologically persuasive TV spots produced based on these recommendations (client spends over $12,000,000 in TV advertising a year.)  Marketing Psychology also does one-on-one consulting and small seminars designed to help small businesses understand the psychology of consumer buying in their industry, and provides training for employees in how to give customers a 5-star experience with the business.First Principle of Marketing Psychology:  "People do not want to buy what you are selling!  Instead, sell them what they want to buy!"  Marketing psychology is the gateway to discover what you are really selling and how to sell it.

Taught psychology, marketing and communication courses online for this 90-year old university.  Courses include Business Ethics, Adult Development, Managerial Marketing, Communication in Organizations, and Contemporary Social Problems.  Developed several undergrad and grad courses. Receive consistently excellent student reviews. Wrote textbook, Adult Development and Life Assessment, for Ashford University Press.

Disciple of Jesus
November 7, 2016, Anthony was a client of Dr. Gary A.’s

As a successful sales leader for over 2 decades, 1 absolute truth I’ve learned: A Proven, Successful, Repeatable Process delivers results!  Gary’s academic approach forces you to think.  He doesn’t tell you what he thinks, he guides productive thought with articulate questions leaving you at a conclusion based on objective thinking.  Gary has a process and it works!  It’s educational, collaborative, real world, challenging and you understand WHY you arrive at the result.  If you need to dive into the cerebral side of Marketing Gary’s your guy, he was for me.

Donald Hoffman
Controller/CFO
March 1, 2012, Donald was a client of Dr. Gary A.’s

I've known Don through a business relationship for several years, and also consulted with one of his business clients on marketing issues.  In addition, Don is a professor of Finance at a university which I teach for, so I've gained a good understanding not only of Don's professional skills, but also the type of individual he is.  Don is skilled in helping small businesses with a wide variety of common problems.  But Don goes one step further in client service by  educating them on what and why he recommends a course of action so they will improve their own business skills.  Don creates a warm and caring relationship with his clients, letting them know he is focused on their success, not his.  Every small business I know that has employed Don as an advisor has been pleased, and valued his work.  Whenever any client of ours has needed management and financial help, I've always recommended Don as the "go to" guy.  I think you'll find him valuable, too.

summary: Dr. Witt's passion is to save  the more than 20 children a day, nearly 8,000 a year, who accidentally  shoot themselves or others,  most times with a hidden gun they found. Global Gun Safety is a marketing and sales company for ChildSafe1, an advanced trigger blocker which children cannot remove, but trained adults can in two seconds. GGS wants every family to realize there is no such thing as a hidden gun when a child is present. Only protected guns are safe guns around children!Dr. Witt spent his professional career in the nexus of human psychology, communications and marketing. He is the founder and president of Marketing Psychology in Scottsdale, which does buyer research and psychological analysis. His core expertise is in the application of these disciplines to help clients influence customer behavior and buying decisions.    He has previously been an Assistant Professor at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, and an adjunct professor at five other universities, teaching psychology, ethics, communication and marketing, as well as developing many courses. Dr. Witt's clients have included USWest Communication, Dental Solutions, Western Dental Corporation, Health Payment Systems, Kodak, 1-800-Flowers, MultiPlan PPOs (New York), Wisconsin Preferred Provider Network, Crate & Barrel, Allied Global Partners (Tokyo), among others.  Prior to that he was a television news director and an educational television producer/writer.  He has won numerous national awards for his creative work. He is the author of "High Impact: How to Create Ads That Sell!"​ and "101 Ways to Improve Your Business Website,"​ and is co-author of a new e-book "7.5 Secrets to a Successful Blog."​  He also has written a psychology textbook, "Adult Development."​    He recently gave two invited lecturers on buyer behavior in Rome at St. John's University and at Loyola University.Contact Dr. Witt at 480 223 7705 or by e-mail at witt@marketingpsychology.com in Scottsdale, Arizona.
name: Dr. Gary A. Witt
title: CEO, Global Gun Safety, saving children from gunshots with the most advanced trigger blocker.  Marketing Psychologist.
